solution_line_template: December has {december_days} days, January has {january_days} days and February has {february_days} days for a total of {december_days}+{january_days}+{february_days} = <<{december_days}+{january_days}+{february_days}={total_days}>>{total_days} days

He feeds them {morning_feed} cup in the morning and {afternoon_feed} cup in the afternoon for a total of {morning_feed}+{afternoon_feed} = <<{morning_feed}+{afternoon_feed}={daily_feed}>>{daily_feed} cup per day
If he feeds them {daily_feed} cup per day for {total_days} days then he will need {daily_feed}*{total_days} = <<{daily_feed}*{total_days}={total_food_needed}>>{total_food_needed} cups of birdseed
